title: Request for appointment of counsel
context: §802-3 Request for appointment of counsel. Any person entitled to representation by a public defender or other appointed counsel may at any reasonable time request any judge to appoint counsel to represent the person. [L 1971, c 185, pt of §1; HRS §705C-3; ren L 1972, c 9, pt of §1 and am L 1972, c 44, §1(b); gen ch 1985]
